page.title: 08WARWICK BRIDGE EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Our survey showed that most adults in this area work in Carlisle.The majoity of women work at home ,as housewifes but quite a lot have partime jobs.Many younger adults are unemployed or are on a Youth Employment Schemes.Although there is a shortage of jobs,there does not seem to be the enormously high unemployment here as we understand there is in many cities.As well as working in offices, factories,shops,Civic Centre,etc.there are people who run small businesses such as garages,shops,lorry drivers,old folks homes,farms,etc. There is not much primary industry here. The area serves as a dormitory for Carlisle.
